overview: As an experimental depiction of trying to finish a chore, a young man enters a grassy yard and seeing the giant vegetation, gathers his tools and sets to work. During the preparation and hard work, he faces various obstacles. He struggles to overcome them and bring the effort to completion.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: A young man trying to complete a chore, or perhaps something more difficult?
title: 2 stroke scissors
